modName: Ash Creep Cluster Ingredient Color Change
summary: Change ash creep cluster ingredient color from red to yellow.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]This fix is integrated in USLEEP since version 3.0.5. [/size][/b]

Ash creep cluster as a plant in the world has yellow color, but after harvesting you can see in the inventory it's red. I was wondering if it's done on purpose, so I tried to find any information regarding this. Didn't find any, so I assumed Skyrim creators had forgotten about it or just hadn't cared too much (my assumption can by wrong though).

The mod changes the color of ash creep cluster ingredient from red to yellow.
Requires Dragonborn DLC.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Just put the file in Data folder.
author: dailyplanet
